summary: Retexture of Demon hunter Armor v2 by Jmenaru.
descriptionHtml:
Update 7-03-2013:

Sorry about the quick update, had to make some fixes and stuff. I didn\'t check things properly before I uploaded, my bad. :D

Fixed cube map mask and cube map.

Download the update file only if you\'ve downloaded version one. 

Main package has been updated as well. If you haven\'t downloaded version 1, download version 1.01 and everything should be good.



Description:
This is a retexture of the Demon Hunter Armor v2 by Jmenaru. Texture resolution is the same as the textures that come with Jmenaru\\\'s version. I really like the armor but I wanted to try to get it looking closer to the concept, and this is the results.

You must download and install the original files: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29419//?

Only the texture files are included in this package. 


*******************************************************
While not required, I would highly suggest using ENB series with reflections enabled and potentially edit your specular settings to get the look shown in the screenshots. This is just a suggestion and things may vary depending on your ENB preset etc.
*******************************************************


(NOTE: I am using K ENB with ENB version 186, if certain settings are not present in your enbseries.ini then ignore them)

My ENB settings:

[REFLECTION]
Quality=0
FilterQuality=0
FilterBluriness=1.0
SizeScale=0.5		
SourceTexturesScale=0.5			
Amount=1.0				
Power=0.5				
GlosinessMin=1.0
GlosinessMax=1.0
EnableDenoiser=true
DenoiserType=2
EnableSupersampling=true
ExteriorEnable=true
InteriorEnable=true

[ENVIRONMENT] (NOTE: This is only the specular part of the environment settings)
SpecularAmountMultiplierDay=2.0
SpecularAmountMultiplierNight=1.5
SpecularAmountMultiplierInteriorDay=1.0
SpecularAmountMultiplierInteriorNight=1.0
SpecularPowerMultiplierDay=0.25
SpecularPowerMultiplierNight=0.25
SpecularPowerMultiplierInteriorDay=0.25
SpecularPowerMultiplierInteriorNight=0.25
SpecularFromLightDay=0.0
SpecularFromLightNight=0.5			
SpecularFromLightInteriorDay=0.0
SpecularFromLightInteriorNight=0.0



Installation:
Overwrite Jmenaru\\\'s original texture files with these. Use NMM to make your modding life easier.


Permissions:
If you would like to modify and share any of the files contained in this archive you must get permission from Jmenaru first, as the files contained in the archive are based on his works. Other than that, you may modify and share my work, no need to ask.

Credit:
Thanks to Jmenaru for sharing your work, and allowing me to share my revision.
author: AnOldFriend
